data.title: Sleepycat - affiliate program
data.text:
Company Description: SleepyCat is an online sleep solutions company that believes in delivering luxurious sleep to everyone. Established in 2017 to quickly become internet's highest rated mattress in India, they constantly innovate and think outside the box to bring premium sleep products directly to customers. They are committed to improving the lives of people in a meaningful manner by providing them with optimum comfort and support through their range of high quality products. SleepyCat's current line-up includes an array of mattresses, pillows, bedding and more. They strive to stay true to our motto - a well-slept you is a purr-fect you! Campaign Description: It is a CPS campaign in which affiliate must divert the traffic to advertiser site which can be converted into sales. Advertiser offering their affiliates to run it Pan INDIA with the targeting of audience which mentioned under the targeting criteria. All allowed promotional methods are selected under traffic sources. Objective: The main objective of the campaign is to get users to purchase on SleepyCat.

Company Description: SleepyCat is an online sleep solutions company that believes in delivering luxurious sleep to everyone. Established in 2017 to quickly become internet's highest rated mattress in India, they constantly innovate and think outside the box to bring premium sleep products directly to customers. They are committed to improving the lives of people in a meaningful manner by providing them with optimum comfort and support through their range of high quality products. SleepyCat's current line-up includes an array of mattresses, pillows, bedding and more. They strive to stay true to our motto - a well-slept you is a purr-fect you!

Campaign Description: It is a CPS campaign in which affiliate must divert the traffic to advertiser site which can be converted into sales. Advertiser offering their affiliates to run it Pan INDIA with the targeting of audience which mentioned under the targeting criteria. All allowed promotional methods are selected under traffic sources.

Objective: The main objective of the campaign is to get users to purchase on SleepyCat.

Geo - Pan India

General Terms

All allowed traffic sources are mentioned in the campaign detail.

Authentic promotional methods should be used to promote the campaign.

Advertiser holds the complete right to deny all pending payments in the event of fraud or malpractice.

Any violation of rules or using unapproved creative is subject to legal action and heavy penalty.

Brand bidding is not allowed:

Brand Keywords - SleepyCat

SleepyCat is an online sleep solutions company that believes in delivering luxurious sleep to everyone. Established in 2017 to quickly become internet's highest rated mattress in India, they constantly innovate and think outside the box to bring premium sleep products directly to customers. They are committed to improving the lives of people in a meaningful manner by providing them with optimum comfort and support through their range of high quality products. SleepyCat's current line-up includes an array of mattresses, pillows, bedding and more. They strive to stay true to our motto - a well-slept you is a purr-fect you!

Experience sleep like never before with SleepyCat. 100-nights trial & free shipping. Premium mattress shipped right to your doorstep.

Conversion Flow:

* User clicks on the tracking URL.

* User makes a purchase.

* Pixel fires here.

* Payment will be made only for conversions meeting KPI.

Tracking Information:

Frequency - Real time

Cookie duration - 7 days

Web - Available

Mobile Web - Available

App - Not Available

Deeplink - Available

Multiple Conversions - Not Available

Conditional tracking issue exists: No

Validation Period: 45 Days

Promotion Methods:

Content - Not Allowed

Coupon - Allowed

Cashback - Allowed

Mobile App - Not Allowed

Email - Allowed

SMS - Not Allowed

Telegram - Not Allowed

Influencer - Not Allowed

Software - Not Allowed

Media Buying : Search - Not Allowed

Media Buying : Social - Not Allowed

Media Buying : Native - Not Allowed

Media Buying : Display - Allowed

Sub-Network - Not Allowed

Pop - Allowed

Push - Not Allowed

Video - Not Allowed

Reseller - Not Allowed

Incent - Not Allowed

Smartlink - Not Available

Sale Amount Currency: INR

ADVSUB: Order ID

ADVSUB2: NA

ADVSUB3: NA

ADVSUB4: NA

ADVSUB5: NA

Missing sales process: - Not Allowed

Payout: Below slab wise

Tier GMV % Com on Rev Upto 6L 4.20% 6L to 10L 5.60% 10L to 15L 8.4% 15 above 10.5%

Detailed KPI:

1. Cancelled/Returned orders will not be payable.

2. Audience details: Users staying mostly in urban metros looking for buying mattress, bed & pillows online.

3. Sales Attribution Source - Google Analytics with 7 Day Cookie Duration (Orders that are not captured in GA against your source / medium won't be considered for validation)
